# Mattermost MCP Server

> MCP server providing 36 tools for Mattermost integration:
> channels, messages, reactions, threads, users, teams, files, and bookmarks.

## Docs

- [Getting Started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/getting-started.md): Installation and Claude Desktop configuration
- [Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/configuration.md): Environment variables and options
- [Channel Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/channels.md): List, create, join channels (9 tools)
- [Message Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/messages.md): Send, search, edit messages (5 tools)
- [Post Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/posts.md): Reactions, pins, threads (6 tools)
- [User Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/users.md): Lookup users and status (5 tools)
- [Team Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/teams.md): Team information (3 tools)
- [File Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/files.md): Upload and download files (3 tools)
- [Bookmark Tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/docs/tools/bookmarks.md): Channel bookmarks (5 tools)

## Optional

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/README.md): Full project overview
- [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/legard/mcp-server-mattermost/main/CHANGELOG.md): Version history
